drops: Remembrance of the Twin Moon Knight
Remembrance of the Wild Boar Rider

name: Midra, Lord of Frenzied Flame
blockquote: Enough.... I have endured more than enough...I ask you forgive me, dearest Nanaya...

drops: Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame
Remembrance of the Saint of the Bud
Remembrance of the Mother of Fingers

name: Messmer the Impaler
blockquote: Mother, wouldst thou truly Lordship sanction, in one so bereft of light?

name: Base Serpent Messmer
blockquote: Wilt thou be taken in the jaws... of the abbyssal serpent, shorn of light.

name: Promised Consort Radahn
blockquote: Now, the vow will be honoured, and my Lord brother's soul will return.

drops: Remembrance of a God and a Lord

name: Radahn, Consort of Miquella
blockquote: Now, the vow will be honoured, and my Lord brother's soul will return.

drops: Remembrance of a God and a Lord

name: Godrick the Grafted
blockquote: I command thee, kneel! I am the lord of all that is golden!

name: Rennala Carian Queen of the Full Moon
blockquote: Hush, little culver. I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pureâ€¦

drops: Remembrance of the Full Moon Queen

name: Starscourge Radahn
blockquote: The Red Lion General wielded gravitational powers which he learned in Sellia during his younger days. All so he would never have to abandon his beloved but scrawny steed.

name: Morgott The Grace-Given Veiled Monarch Omen King
blockquote: Have it writ upon thy meagre grave: "Felled by King Morgott! Last of all kings."

drops: Talisman Pouch (NG only, Margit not defeated)

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
blockquote: Join the Serpent King, as family... Together, we will devour the very gods!

name: Mohg, Lord of Blood
blockquote: Welcome, honored guest. To the birthplace of our Dynasty!

name: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
blockquote: ...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat.

drops: 480,000 Malenia's Great Rune Remembrance of the Rot Goddess

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
blockquote: After Godwyn the Golden became the Prince of Death, the ancient dragon fought long and hard against the Death within its companion. Alas, victory was never achieved and its only reward was corruption.

name: Maliketh, The Black Blade
blockquote: Cower before Maliketh, Marikaâ€™s Black Blade.

name: Astel, Naturalborn of the Void
blockquote: A malformed star born in the lightless void far away. Once destroyed an Eternal City and took away their sky. A falling star of ill omen.

name: Regal Ancestor Spirit
blockquote: Ancestral spirits exist as a phenomenon beyond the purview of the Erdtree. Life sprouts from death, as it does from birth. Such is the way of the living.

name: Radagon of the Golden Order
blockquote: As the husband of Rennala of Caria, the red-haired Radagon studied sorcery, and as the husband of Queen Marika, he studied incantations. Thus did the hero aspire to be complete.

name: Fire Giant
blockquote: The Fire Giant is a survivor of the War against the Giants. Upon realizing the flames of their forge would never die, Queen Marika marked him with a curse.

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
blockquote: The Dragonlord whose seat lies at the heart of the storm beyond time is said to have been Elden Lord in the age before the Erdtree. Once his god was fled, the lord continued to await its return.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Jagged Peak

name: Cemetery Shade
blockquote: Insect-ridden grave keepers.

name: Dragonkin Soldier
blockquote: Alas, the Dragonkin Soldiers never attained immortality, and perished as decrepit, pale imitations of their skyborn kin.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen
blockquote: Someone must extinguish thy flame. Let it be Margit the Fell!

drops: Talisman Pouch (NG only, Morgott not defeated)

name: Flying Dragon Agheel
blockquote: The dead gazed at the skies over the lakes of Limgrave, praying that the dragons' flames would burn them to ash.

name: Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella
blockquote: The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.

name: Glintstone Dragon Adula
blockquote: Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.

name: Borealis, the Freezing Fog
blockquote: The ice dragons were once lords of the mountaintops long ago, until they were defeated by the Fire Giants and chased from the peak.

name: Decaying Ekzykes
blockquote: Ekzykes, Dragon Communion Revenger, did not forget his hatred even as he succumbed to the scarlet rot.

name: Valiant Gargoyle
blockquote: The missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.

name: Valiant Gargoyle
blockquote: The missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Spiritcaller Cave , Mountaintops of the Giants

name: Godskin Duo
blockquote: The black flame could once slay gods. But when Maliketh sealed Destined Death, the true power of the black flame was lost.

drops: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
Ash of War: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings

name: Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers
blockquote: My Shining Star.

name: Death Rite Bird
blockquote: In the time when there was no Erdtree, death was burned in ghostflame. Deathbirds were the keepers of that fire.

name: Tree Sentinel
blockquote: The living rampart of the Erdtree, the Tree Sentinels are the standard to which all defenders of the Erdtree aspire.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head
blockquote: Though he has stifled his panic within the dark confines of his helmet, he rampages as if driven mad when agitated by bloodshed or the humming of insects. This mad soldier is all that is left of a broken gladiator.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog
blockquote: The Watchdogs, battered and broken over their lengthy tenure, rule the catacombs and are even said to command the imps.

name: Stonedigger Troll
blockquote: Trolls are descended from the giants, and their hammers were supposedly once used as ceremonial smithing tools. In the distant past, smithing was considered divine.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Limgrave Tunnels

name: Rick, Soldier Of God
blockquote: That depraved lot are obsessed with sacrificing Tarnished like you for the sake of "grafting".

name: Beastman of Farum Azula
blockquote: Beastmen from the doomed Farum Azula, the slowly crumbling ruins in the skies. These ruins are said to be the remains of a giant mausoleum enshrining an ancient dragon, guarded by chosen beastmen who wield weapons clad in lightning.

name: Demi-Human Chiefs
blockquote: They'll rush in and beat you to a pulp. You'll end up just like me. - Boc the Seamster

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor
blockquote: These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.

name: Tree Sentinel
blockquote: The living rampart of the Erdtree, the Tree Sentinels are the standard to which all defenders of the Erdtree aspire.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
blockquote: After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Crumbling Farum Azula

name: Black Knife Assassin
blockquote: The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.

name: Crystalian
blockquote: The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers..

name: Night's Cavalry
blockquote: The Night's Cavalry, who now wander the dim roads at night, were once led by the Fell Omen and were deliverers of death for great warriors, knights, and champions.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
blockquote: Elemer murdered numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.

name: Crucible Knight Ordovis
blockquote: Ordovis, one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights.

name: Black Blade Kindred
blockquote: Valiant Gargoyles, mended with blackened corpse wax. Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Death Rite Bird
blockquote: In the time when there was no Erdtree, death was burned in ghostflame. Deathbirds were the keepers of that fire.

name: Sir Gideon Ofnir, The All-Knowing
blockquote: Queen Marika has high hopes for us. That we continue to struggle, unto eternity.

name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
blockquote: Darriwil is nothing but a traitor. And in need of a fitting end to his tale. - Blaidd

name: Esgar, Priest of Blood
blockquote: Aided by his two ferocious dogs, this Priest is capable of the deadliest hemorrhage-inducing attacks.

name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
blockquote: The assassins who carried out the deed were scions of the Eternal City. A group entirely of women, arrayed in armour of silver under cloaks which fooled the eye.

name: Grave Warden Duelist
blockquote: Duelists who were exiled from the colosseum.

name: Cleanrot Knight
blockquote: The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.

name: Spiritcaller Snail
blockquote: A strange snail-like creature that gives off a pale glow. While weak on their own, they summon forth spirits from beyond to fight on their behalf. But once the snail dies, the spirit will vanish.

name: Onyx Lord
blockquote: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago. They were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Adan, Thief of Fire
blockquote: The monks came to the land of Liurnia in pursuit of a fugitive who stole their fire.

name: Onyx Lord
blockquote: A race of ancients with skin of stone who were said to have risen to life when a meteor struck long ago. They were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
blockquote: Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the form of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.

name: Battlemage Hugues
blockquote: Hugues came from Sellia to study the Haima Conspectus at the academy, where he became a battlemage. Haima scholars seek to quell conflict with cannon fire and the gavel, but Hugues developed a longing for it.

name: Bloodhound Knight
blockquote: The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made, the knight stays loyal for life.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Cuckoo's Evergaol , Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Commander O'Neil
blockquote: Even after his lord was fled, Commander O'Neil continued to brandish his flag in the devastation of the rot-eaten field of battle, the sole veteran who remembers that battle with pride.

name: Commander Niall
blockquote: Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered his prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated knights held prisoner. He went on to lead these men as an army of no nation.

name: Deathbird
blockquote: The Deathbirds are graveyard fire keepers; it is said they rake out the ashen remains of the dead from their kilns.

name: Elemer of the Briar
blockquote: Elemer of the Briar, the Bell Bearing Hunter, snatched the sword from the site of his looming execution, and furnished it with battle skills from his home of Eochaid

LocationsAndDrops.location: Stormhill Castle Morne Ainsel River Well Leyndell, Royal Capital Mountaintops of the Giants
drops: 844 - 3927 Runes Golem's Halberd Golem Greatbow Great Arrow Golem's Great Arrow Golem's Magic Arrow Smithing Stones

name: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
blockquote: Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.

name: God-Devouring Serpent
blockquote: The great serpent of Mt. Gelmir that swallowed Praetor Rykard. Attacks with poisonous spit, bites, and slams.

name: Godskin Apostle
blockquote: The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

name: Godskin Noble
blockquote: Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.

name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
blockquote: The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on â€” as a hero of the War against the Giants.

name: Guardian Golem
blockquote: One of the many constructs found across the Lands Between. It wields a large halberd to attack, along with being able to breath fire on anything below it.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Stormveil Castle Fort Gael (Caelid) Redmane Castle Castle Sol Leyndell, Royal Capital

name: Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
blockquote: Loretta, once a royal Carian Knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.

name: Magma Wyrm
blockquote: Those who have performed the Dragon Communion will find their humanity slowly slipping away. Once they fully succumb to their fate, they are left no more than wyrms that crawl the earth.

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
blockquote: It's said these land-bound dragons were once human heroes who partook in dragon communion, a grave transgression for which they were cursed to crawl the earth upon their bellies, shadows of their former selves.

name: Miranda The Blighted Bloom
blockquote: Miranda, maiden of the Flower Crucible is said to have been the very first of this breed.

name: Misbegotten Warrior
blockquote: A Vicious beast that has lost all reason, attacking indiscriminately.

name: Mohg, the Omen
blockquote: The reigning lord and hierarch of the coming dynasty of Mohgwyn. Or perhaps, of a raving lunatic.

name: Necromancer Garris
blockquote: The heads of his flail were made to resemble those of his wife and two children.

name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Monk
blockquote: Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.

name: Patches
blockquote: Well, well, well? Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?

LocationsAndDrops.location: Murkwater Cave , Limgrave Liurnia Mt. Gelmir Volcano Manor The Shaded Castle

name: Putrid Avatar
blockquote: Guardians of the Minor Erdtrees, infested with Scarlet Rot. Their large staff can knock foes away, and their slam attack releases a cloud of rot, quickly leading to enemiesâ€™ demise.

name: Roundtable Knight Vyke
blockquote: No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?

name: Royal Revenant
blockquote: An obscene and disturbing abomination, blend of a spider-like creature and human limbs resulting in a quite resourceful fighter at close range.

name: Sanguine Noble
blockquote: Known to strike from pools of blood, these assassins are missionaries come to share the gospel of accursed blood.

name: Scaly Misbegotten
blockquote: The misbegotten are held to be a punishment for making contact with the Crucible, and from birth they are treated as slaves, or worse.

name: Mimic Tear
blockquote: Those of the Eternal City have created a special type of Silver Tear, capable of completely mimicking its opponent, along with any spells, skills and armaments they have.

LocationsAndDrops.location: Nokron, Eternal City Hidden Path to the Haligtree
drops: Silver Tear Mask Hidden Path to the Haligtree:
